channel.title: [PI] Client how do you add ip to the client so people can play
channel.description: I got a question: I changed the ip and everything in the client and I sent a buddy of mine the client and he's cache wouldn't work untill he extracted the erasedpkzcachev1 to hes c:drive. The client worked but he could not connect to my server. I portforwarded and everything and also checked on runelocus if it was online and it is. Please help.

item.title: [PI] Client how do you add ip to the client so people can play
item.dc:creator: @cLass1 .cLass
item.description:
@cLass1 wrote:

To set the IP which the client will connect to, go to client.java and search for;

server = "

Inside the “” put your IP/No-ip

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Client how do you add ip to the client so people can play
item.dc:creator: @One_camel One camel
item.description:
@One_camel wrote:

I got a question: I changed the ip and everything in the client and I sent a buddy of mine the client and he’s cache wouldn’t work untill he extracted the erasedpkzcachev1 to hes c:drive. The client worked but he could not connect to my server. I portforwarded and everything and also checked on runelocus if it was online and it is. Please help.
